title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack Platform: Build with AI-Powered Development (AIM111)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack 平台：使用 AI 驱动的开发构建 (AIM111)
abstract: Learn how to create, use, and launch AI-powered Slack apps, including existing AWS systems, into Slack with minimal effort. See how GitHub, Cursor, Codex, AWS and other tools run natively in Slack channels, enabling multi-player AI interactions. By bringing your custom and third-party solutions together in one context-rich conversational interface, your AI tools turn into collaborative teammates to streamline your business operations. This presentation is brought to you by Slack from Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 学习如何创建、使用和启动AI驱动的Slack应用程序，包括将现有AWS系统以最小的努力集成到Slack中。了解GitHub、Cursor、Codex、AWS和其他工具如何在Slack频道中原生运行，实现多人AI交互。通过将您的自定义和第三方解决方案整合到一个富含上下文的对话界面中，您的AI工具将转变为协作队友，简化您的业务运营。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Salesforce旗下的Slack为您呈现。
